Entries.Introduction: Oh... You're that new farmer {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/GenericNoun}} }} }}, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.
Entries.Tue: Nice shoes.#$b#Are those made out of plastic?#$e#I'm bored.

Changes.LogName: Fix Haley - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
